namelist_defaults.use_case_desc: Simulate transient land-use, and aerosol deposition changes from 1850 to current day with historical data, and then to 2100 with the CMIP6 SSP3-7.0 scenario
Simulate transient land-use, aerosol deposition, and Nitrogen deposition changes from 1850 to current day with historical data, and then to 2100 with the CMIP6 SSP3-7.0 scenario
